TopicTitle: Project Alexandria: a history of spaceflight done in Real Solar System

Articles.Content:
Sounds good Bob.

@Sampa - Alt-f12 - hack gravity.

Sounds good Bob.

@Sampa - Alt-f12 - hack gravity.

Thanks

I must sound like a broken record... But! Mars awaits:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132570-Little-Green-Men-From-Mars

Goodness knows we could use your insight, advice and story line Bob. Kerbals (or Marbles) don't look anything like HG Well's Martians. Don't look much like Mark Watney either, for that matter. So maybe a new plot is in order.

BTW, Where did you get those awesome launch pad flood lights?

EDIT: Found 'em: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135730-1-0-4-KSC-Floodlight

Edited October 5, 2015 by Probus
Quick question to the OP: Where'd you get the version of the Soviet national anthem you used in the 1959pt2 vid?

Quick question to the OP: Where'd you get the version of the Soviet national anthem you used in the 1959pt2 vid?

I didn't save the link after I downloaded it.

I had to search a lot to find one that no one was claiming a copyright on. I should have saved the link.

The file on my drive is called "Soviet_Anthem_Instrumental_1955" in case that helps you search for it.

I didn't save the link after I downloaded it.

I had to search a lot to find one that no one was claiming a copyright on. I should have saved the link.

The file on my drive is called "Soviet_Anthem_Instrumental_1955" in case that helps you search for it.

Drat, ok. Well if the license is clear maybe I'll just gank it from yours .

Out of curiosity, what do you use for screen capture/editing?

I capture with Fraps and edit with PowerDirector 13. (There is a new PD 14 but I got it and it sucks for my editing. It has bugs, changed features I like and made them harder to use, and it's slower.)
1963 is done and ready for Monday
Sweet! Can't wait!
If you ever do a stock sized Solar System Series use this https://github.com/Nhawks1717/RVE-Stock/releases
Felbourn, ever thought about releasing some of your decals to the public to use? Those are,awesome and i am positive several of us would download them...myself included.

Felbourn, ever thought about releasing some of your decals to the public to use? Those are,awesome and i am positive several of us would download them...myself included.

I know I for one would definitely download it yes yes yes
My entire install is in the repo. That includes my decal textures.

Ornithopter humpback whale B-52 @ 31:40 was so graceful!

whats the decal mod?

Ornithopter humpback whale B-52 @ 31:40 was so graceful!

whats the decal mod?

Nebula Decals. You need to download an updated Firespitter.dll separately though.
Why didn't you cover Kennedy's death and the first full Saturn I launch. Still an amazing episode, can't wait till we get to Apollo !!!!
I did mention JFK's death, and I have launched the only relevant Saturn I. It was 1961. The next relevant Saturn "first" is 1964.

Oh. Okay did not know that.

- - - Updated - - -

Okay, may I ask, what tank did you use for the Saturn I? FASA?
I am betting showing the apollo 1 fire will be difficult when you get to it.

Oh. Okay did not know that.

- - - Updated - - -

Okay, may I ask, what tank did you use for the Saturn I? FASA?

Yes, FASA.

- - - Updated - - -

I am betting showing the apollo 1 fire will be difficult when you get to it.

Yea. Probably.
Actually, the Apollo 13 flight would also be difficult, particularly the oxygen tank explosion and venting.

Actually, the Apollo 13 flight would also be difficult, particularly the oxygen tank explosion and venting.

That seems easier to me, conceptually.

I think it goes without saying that it would be in poor taste to reenact Apollo 1. I think the best way would be to mention it using memorial footage and stock footage of the aftermath. It an important part of the American space program however unfortunate.

I don't know if you would be able to use it but I think you should use this or clips from this if you can.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V0W9bQ2Jg3A

Edited October 14, 2015 by sp1989
If it goes without saying, why say it? I know you're trying to help out, but... have some faith in me?
